final_output: status='pending' summary='Liquidity provision for AlphaNexus-ETH with medium risk level, 0.3% max slippage tolerance, and dynamic adjustments based on market conditions' acp_payload=AcpPayload(action_type=<ActionType.LIQUIDITY_PROVISION: 'liquidity_provision'>, parameters={'target_pool': 'AlphaNexus-ETH', 'strategy_type': 'slippage_optimized', 'risk_adjustment': {'level': 'medium', 'max_slippage_tolerance': '0.3%', 'volatility_threshold': '15%', 'rebalancing_interval': '6h'}, 'liquidity_bands': [{'range': '0.8%', 'allocation': '40%', 'dynamic_adjustment': {'trigger': 'volatility_breach', 'adjustment_factor': '0.5x'}}, {'range': '1.5%', 'allocation': '30%', 'dynamic_adjustment': {'trigger': 'volume_spike', 'adjustment_factor': '1.2x'}}, {'range': '3.0%', 'allocation': '20%', 'dynamic_adjustment': {'trigger': 'sentiment_shift', 'adjustment_factor': '1.5x'}}, {'range': '5.0%', 'allocation': '10%', 'dynamic_adjustment': {'trigger': 'extreme_event', 'adjustment_factor': '2.0x'}}], 'execution_parameters': {'twap_duration': '30m', 'price_impact_monitoring': {'alert_threshold': '0.25%', 'auto_pause_threshold': '0.5%'}, 'gas_optimization': {'priority': 'medium', 'max_gas_price': '50 gwei'}}, 'sentiment_adjustment': {'current_sentiment': 0.3, 'adjustment_factor': 0.85, 'sentiment_ranges': [{'range': '0.0-0.2', 'action': 'reduce_30%'}, {'range': '0.2-0.4', 'action': 'reduce_15%'}, {'range': '0.4-0.6', 'action': 'neutral'}, {'range': '0.6-0.8', 'action': 'increase_15%'}, {'range': '0.8-1.0', 'action': 'increase_30%'}]}, 'monitoring': {'metrics': ['slippage_actual', 'price_impact', 'volume_velocity', 'liquidity_depth'], 'alert_channels': ['webhook', 'telegram', 'email'], 'health_check_interval': '15m'}, 'contingency_plans': [{'condition': 'slippage > 0.5%', 'action': 'pause_and_rebalance'}, {'condition': 'volume_drop_50%_1h', 'action': 'reduce_exposure_50%'}, {'condition': 'sent< 0.2', 'action': 'activate_hedging'}]}, risk_level=<RiskLevel.MEDIUM: 'medium'>)
